short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of people taling about Trump on the internet? This extension replaces "Trump" with "Feel the Bern!!!"

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Am I the only Berniecrat that is tired of news stations and people all over the internet That only talk about Trump? It can get very annoying. So I have made this handy Extension that changes that. Either way, its free! So everyone can Feel The Bern!
